mapper.select: select r.* from rooms r join participants p on r.id = p.room_id where p.user_id = #{id} and r.data_type = "개인";
mapper.insert: insert into rooms (id, data_type, create_time, title, image_url) values (#{id}, #{dataType}, now(), #{title}, #{imageUrl})
insert into participants (room_id, user_id, image_url, nickname) values (#{roomId}, #{userId}, #{imageUrl}, #{nickname})
